Content.Question:
Dave: Hi, Pippa.
Pippa: Hi, how are you?
Dave: Fine. Nice day, isn’t it?
Pippa: Mmm, lovely.
Dave: Did you have a good weekend?
Pippa: It was all right. How about you?
Dave: We didn’t do much. We went to
a party on Saturday and yesterday we
just spent the day at home
relaxing. Nothing special.
Pippa: Well, I’d better get on with this.
Dave: Sure. I’ll just go and get a coffee. Do you want anything?
Pippa: No, I’m all right thanks.
Alex: Morning.
Dave: Morning, Alex. Have you been away?
Alex: Yes, just for a few days.
Dave: I thought I hadn’t seen you. Did you go anywhere nice?
Alex: Yeah, we went to Portugal. To the Algarve.
Dave: Did you have good weather?
Alex: Yes, it was great. I didn’t want to come back! How are you Pippa? You weren’t
feeling very well last time I saw you.
Are you feeling better?
Pippa: Oh, yes, I’m much better, thanks. It’s just that I’ve got to finish this …
Alex: Oh yes, well see you later.
Dave: Bye.
Pippa: Bye. Nice to see you.
